summary: Build an MLM (network marketing) app for FINNET GROW VENTURES (FNGV) to sell services/products with an associate-based referral program and payouts for referrals.
architectural_notes: App is an MLM (network marketing) platform for FINNET GROW VENTURES (FNGV) centered on associates, referrals, and payouts.

existing_features.title: Implement authentication via Internet Identity and create an Associate account model so a signed-in user is recognized as an FNGV associate with a profile (e.g., name, phone/email, join date, status).
Implement the referral program: allow an associate to invite/register new associates with a referral code/link, store the referrer relationship, and provide a view of an associate’s direct referrals.
Provide a simple network view that shows an associate’s downline structure (at minimum: a tree or grouped lists for Level 1 and Level 2 referrals) with counts and basic details.
Implement a product and service catalog module: admins (or a defined privileged role) can create/update catalog items, and associates can browse the catalog and view item details.
Implement a basic sales flow: allow associates to place an order for a product/service, store order records, and show order history for the signed-in associate.
Implement commission/earnings tracking tied to referrals and sales: record commission events in a ledger, compute an associate’s available balance, and show an earnings dashboard.
Add a payout request flow: associates can request withdrawal of available balance, admins can review and mark requests as paid/rejected, and the UI reflects payout status and remaining balance.
Create a coherent visual theme and layout for the FNGV app (typography, colors, spacing, card/table styles) and apply it consistently across all screens without using a blue/purple primary palette.

Add core screens and navigation for the MVP: Sign in, Dashboard, Profile, Referrals/Network, Catalog, Orders, Earnings, Payouts, and Admin (for catalog + payouts) with route protection based on authentication and role.

Add generated static brand assets (logo + simple background) and display them in the app (e.g., in header/login/landing) from frontend/public/assets/generated without serving images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Associate onboarding and account management (business partners join as associates)
Referral program: associates can refer other associates and build a network
Add a simple associate dashboard to track referrals and earnings at a glance
